column5: hey every one im new to this forum but i was wondering if you could help me out a little im going to beamsville in a few days dose any one know of a few good spots for carp and catfish because i want to bring my girl friend carp fishing then cat fishing  thxs for the help
You have Jordan Hrbr beside the QEW at the new conservation area.  You can drive up the mountain and run to Wellandport on the river. There is also Charles Daley park.
Go to Dunnville, Grand River.  Huge cats there.  Go to Fishmasters Ultimate charters, lottsa info.  40 minutes from Beamsville.  They get big cats there right from shore. Good luck!
thank you very  much every one for the help i might go to dunnville i just need to figure out were to go up there like i need to figure out were maitland pier is and the dunnville dam
